medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening abdominal pain, nausea/vomiting, reduced appetite, subjective fevers and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began worsening one day ago, with vague abdominal pain that progressed to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Patient has not eaten since yesterday and describes the pain as unlike any she has experienced before. Pain does not radiate and is aggravated by walking.
medical_history.past_medical_history: IBS, depression, anorexia nervosa, basal cell carcinoma, migraines.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with breast cancer, father with prostate cancer, brother with depression.
